data.text:
Felicitaciones @PatricioJLunaA y equipo supervisor por este gran trabajo 🎉

El artículo científico se encuentra en revisión en la revista y próximamente verá la luz! 💪 https://t.co/ujgKcE8WFe

🚨 New publication 🚨

📓 Our latest research shows how blending satellite data 🌧️ 🛰️ with #ML 🤖 can significantly enhance runoff and peak flow 🌊 #forecasting in mountainous settings ⛰️

👀Check this innovative approach for data scarcity areas
 https://t.co/wcId78mZgd https://t.co/yZRc9FyDDe

🌍❗️ Excited to have presented my research at the Water Security and Climate Change Conference in Giessen, Germany 🇩🇪!

I shared how applied science can contribute to better decision-making in water management, particularly hydrological and flood forecasting. 
#WSCC2024 https://t.co/6kb6sTWjAN
